Name: Islander
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Vermouth-based and bittersweet with anise and fennel, and depending on your scotch, also faint smokiness.
History: Adapted from a recipe by Gary "gaz" Regan , New York, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Islander contains 158 calories
